title: Single Pole Toggle Light Switch, 15 Amp, 120 Volt, Framed, Electrical Wall Replacement, Residential and Commercial Grade, 10 Pack, Ivory

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #67,793 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #228 in Electrical Light Switches       #228 in Electrical Light Switches

shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: Toggle light switch using premium-grade polycarbonate thermoplastic and solid steel, ensuring exceptional durability and prolonged usage

Featuring a green grounding screw and self-grounding clip, these replacement electric switch automatically establish grounding within the junction box, offering added protection against electrical shocks

Wall light switch provide both quick push-in wiring and side wiring. Terminal screws accept up to 12AWG and quick push-in wiring accepts 14AWG solid copper wire only. Installation is a breeze with break-off plaster ears and a narrow switch body
Ideal for residential applications and most commercial settings requiring illuminated light switch. Perfect for upgrading or replacing worn-out rocker switches in bedrooms, kitchens, or workspaces
We offer 1 year replacement guarantee for 15 amp electric switch(Non-human damage). If you have any questions about the product, please contact us, we will reply you within 24 hours

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAs advertised - make sure you check the sizes
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: As advertised - make sure you check the sizes

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2025
Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Installed first switch, turned on power, nothing happened. This is in a remodel and the switch before worked fine, so I know nothing wrong with wiring. Checked with volt meter, switch was getting power. Installed second switch nothing. Checked all switches in box for continuity, all checked out fine. As soon as you connect to power, something fries inside the switch. DO NOT PUT THESE POECES OF TRASH IN YOUR WALL! I was not looking for a bargain switch, this was one of the only options for black.

customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsQuality Assurance would help
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I bought twenty switches, used fifteen, and two were bad.  Odd to have a switch like this fail so I double checked connections and they looked fine. Put my meter on the legs and flipped switch but nothing there. Passed an ohm test so really doesn't make sense.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: The switches arrived quickly, and exactly as described.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: In a recent remodel had to replace a number of switches and these TOPELER toggle light switches worked out great. The installation was quick and easy. The switch provides both 14AWG quick push-in wiring and 12AWG side wiring. For my installation I used the push-in wiring. The finish of the switches looks good. It's not an issue, but the switches have a really loud on/off click. Overall, you can't go wrong with these switches.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: You can't go wrong at less than $13 for a 10 pack of switches! We only needed one but my son is going to use the rest to replace other ones throughout the house.They're easy to install and work great. The switch itself is a little "clicky" - a hard up and down. But we have nothing against that. That doesn't take away from my rating.I recommend highly

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These switches did not work.  I had to pay electrician an extra hour to go to the local builders store to buy replacements for these at $1 a piece and they worked perfectly.  Do not buy.  Can’t return because I three part of them away.
